attributes.action: discuss as a mater of urgency with President Obama as a man of compassion and notable humanity to ask him to help and make representation and interceded if possible to stop the extradition proceedings against any person in the UK who has serious mental health issues as a mater of common humanity, and delay any such extradition by at least a year longer then normal for all avenues of reconsideration to be explored.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: May be he could use the outstanding example of Gary McKinnon, where he had no criminal intent and was told he would receive a very minor punishment in the UK not 25 years potentially as a penalty being asked in the USA.

rejection.details: We cannot accept petitions about individual legal cases. Individual legal cases are a matter for direct communication with the Home Office. You may wish to remove the reference to this case.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
